price: 181. O kati ya baye tokela ezali na umma,(1) oyo bazali kokamba mpe kokata makambo na bosembo.
arabic: وَمِمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَآ أُمَّةٞ يَهۡدُونَ بِٱلۡحَقِّ وَبِهِۦ يَعۡدِلُونَ
footnotes: 1 Umma: Lisanga. Bótala suratu Al-Baqarah mikapo: 128.

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamimman khalaqnā ummatun yahdūna bil-ḥaqi wabihi yaʿdilūna
